name: War Domain
description: The War Domain represents the tumult and valor of conflict. Clerics of this domain are battle-ready, excelling in combat and inspiring others to fight. They serve gods who oversee all aspects of war, from honor and chivalry to destruction and conquest.

bonus_proficiency.description: Gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

war_priest.description: When you use the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action. Usable a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), regained on a long rest.

channel_divinity_guided_strike.description: Gain a +10 bonus to an attack roll using your Channel Divinity. Choose after you see the roll but before the DM says if it hits or misses.

channel_divinity_war_gods_blessing.description: Grant a creature within 30 feet a +10 bonus to their attack roll using your Channel Divinity. Choose after you see the roll but before the DM says if it hits or misses.

divine_strike.description: Add 1d8 damage of the same type dealt by the weapon to your weapon attacks. Increases to 2d8 at 14th level.

avatar_of_battle.description: Gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
